title: Don’t Wait For Me
lyrics:
[Intro]
Ah
Ah, ah, ah
[Verse 1]
My darling, I was only 17
Thought I know what love was and what I need
Eyes starry, you were looking like a dream
Didn't move your lips but you spoke to me
[Pre-Chorus]
I've been waiting a while to say I'm sorry cause
My heart's no longer a child
[Chorus]
When I was on a high
And you were on a low
I wouldn't hesitate to pick you back up
And now, I'm in the deep
Can't give you what you need and
I love you too much to make you wait
[Post-Chorus]
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
Don't wait for me
(I can't give you, I can't give you enough)
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
I love you too much to make you wait

[Verse 2]
Forgive me, cause I'm only 23
And I wanna learn what my body needs
It's safe here, but that's not what I want
Wanna taste the danger on my tongue
[Pre-Chorus]
Somethin’ wants to go wild
And yet I'm sorry but
My heart's no longer a child
[Chorus]
When I was on a high
And you were on a low
I wouldn't hesitate to pick you back up
And now, I'm in the deep
Can't give you what you need and
I love you too much to make you wait
[Post-Chorus]
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
Don't wait for me
(I can't give you, I can't give you enough)
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
I love you too much to make you wait
(Ah)

[Bridge]
Sorry that I have to go
When you know, you know, you know, you know
When you know, you know, you know, you know
You won't be sleeping alone
And I know, I know, I know, I know
It hurts me but I know, I know
Sorry that I have to go
When you know, you know, you know, you know
When you know, you know, you know, you know
You won't be sleeping alone
And I know, I know, I know, I know
It hurts me but I know, I know
[Chorus]
When I was on a high
And you were on a low
I wouldn't hesitate to pick you back up
And now, I'm in the deep
Can't give you what you need and
I love you too much to make you wait
[Post-Chorus]
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
Don't wait for me
(I can't give you, I can't give you enough)
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
I-I-I love you too much to make you wait

[Outro]
Ah-ah, ah-ah
(And)
(I can't give you, I can't give you enough)
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
Don't wait for me
(I can't give you, I can't give you enough)
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
I love-
(I can't give you, I can't give you enough)
Don't wait for me
(Yeah, I love you, yeah, I love you so much)
